servinfo.title: Air Bleeding of Clutch System

item.ptxt: Brake fluid is extremely damaging to paint. If fluid should accidentally touch painted surface, immediately wipe fluid from paint and clean painted surface.

When operating the pedal stroke for air bleeding of clutch system, after releasing the clutch pedal, be sure to wait 1 second or more before depressing it again. Otherwise, the oil seal of operating cylinder will be damaged, resulting in oil leakage.

servinfo.ptxt: Bleed air from clutch system. Refer to Air Bleeding of Brake System for air bleeding procedure.
